name: Feature request
about: Suggest a new feature or improvement for RSP Framework
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Description
Clear description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves
What problem does this feature address?

## Proposed Solution
How do you envision this working?

## Alternatives Considered
What other approaches have you thought about?

## Use Cases
Describe scenarios where this would be useful.

## Examples
If applicable, provide examples of similar features elsewhere.

## Implementation Ideas
Any thoughts on how this could be implemented?

## Additional Context
Any other relevant information or screenshots.

## Willing to Contribute?
- [ ] Yes, I can help implement this
- [ ] Yes, I can help with documentation
- [ ] Yes, I can provide examples
- [ ] No, but I'm happy to test and provide feedback
